summary: getting antsy waiting on the new pokemon games so i made some starters for fun! the grass starter is based off of an anteater,...
caption: getting antsy waiting on the new pokemon games so i made some starters for fun! the grass starter is based off of an anteater, the water starter is based off of the sea bunny/ some other sea slugs, and the fire starter is a black sheep!

summary: Lines from Project X Zone 2 I like
title: Lines from Project X Zone 2 I like
body:
One of a couple lines like this and I love them, this is my own sorta humor jamming lines together and flipping around meanings of stuff.

While most of the reference jokes in the game are for video games we got ourselves a simple one to written material, the localization team was having fun.

I didn’t snap the first dialogue where the goggles lady says the same thing, and I almost didn’t catch it was AXEL saying it the second time, fun line.

Our first direction video gaming reference in the list, although to a show based on games… no worries, we’ll get to the direct game references soon.

But first let’s reference a hilarious movie first.  How forced the joke is makes me like it more honestly.

Our first proper reference and I just had to make sure it was something I loved; Sin & Punishment by Treasure Inc is a great game by one of my favorite devs.

This one absolutely floored me to see a reference to something that people only knew existed because internet reviewers turned it into a meme.

I kept this one because it’s one of those jokes where a knowing fan hasta sorta wag their handle horizontally going “I mean… yah… sorta yes sorta no”

I would think tumblr in particular would enjoy a line like this being thrown in, and the best part is it’s a two fold joke… just wait a bit.

Another one like the first picture, I’m totally gonna steal these lines for something in the future.

But wait, we can reference things that were very serious too!

Okay you can stop waiting, here’s the second part, the game calls back to the line with a repetition of it.  Good use of the specific characters too.

Another forced line but screw you, any chance to reference the US version of Oendan is a good chance.

And a title dumping of Vanillaware games for a reference, another company I love, and the localization showing off, Princess’ Crown was never released in the US, they’re being extra nerdy here.

I want a copy of Burning Rangers so bad but legit in box copies are super expensive.  Perfect character for the reference though.

Another joke I was blown away by because I seriously doubt it was made without it being inspired by the internet having discovered the game and making it a meme.

Category: Use of your Segata Sanshiro.  FULL POINTS!

Sometimes you just go for the low hanging fruit, people who claim no one likes an easy target for jokes are wrong as hell.

That no one has used some still shot of part of a Mario Kart race for an image macro meme is actually kinda baffling now that I think about it.

Making fun of ditching Yoshi to get to higher ground will never stop being a thing.

And how about we end on making fun of the Star Wars prequels?  Yah, that sounds pretty solid.

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

summary: In Super Mario 3D World, a glitch in the final level of World 2, Bowser’s Bullet Bill Brigade, can result in Toad being rendered...
caption:
In Super Mario 3D World, a glitch in the final level of World 2, Bowser’s Bullet Bill Brigade, can result in Toad being rendered without his head. To achieve this, have Toad dive into a Cannon Box in his cat form from a specific angle. Toad will have no head and be invulnerable (top). This effect lasts even between room transitions, as Toad will still not have a head while fighting Boom Boom at the end of the stage (bottom). The model will display correctly once Toad touches the Goal Pole and finishes the level.
Main Blog | Twitter | Patreon | Store | Small Findings | Source

blog.name: spookyelric
blog.title: A Blog About Everything.
blog.description:
Name: Jessica Oak or Spooky • 
Business Account: spookys-geek-boutique.tumblr.com
 • Age: 29
 • Location: Toledo, Ohio • 
I am a Gryffindor TO THE MAX!
I like words. I like photos. I like fandoms.
I like shoes. I like makeup. I like tattoos. I like art. I like dreaming. I love Harry Potter. I love books. I like cosplay. I am a feminist. I love the internet.
I love my husband Kevin!! We're dorks

summary: Funko Still Wants To Add Nintendo To Their Range
title: Funko Still Wants To Add Nintendo To Their Range
body:
Funko Still Wants To Add Nintendo To Their Range

Funko has really expanded over the years to the point that almost any and every franchise under the sun has its own range. From TV series like Rick & Morty to big screen movies like Jurassic World and even video game series like God of War, Mass Effect and many more.

Just last year Funko released a Pikachu Funko Pop figure. This year, Funko have announced that even Bulbasaur will be getting its…

View On WordPress

summary:
History 2048 is coming to Nintendo Switch on March 1st 
								History 2048 is a familiar logic game, with beautiful graphics....
caption:
History 2048 is coming to Nintendo Switch on March 1st

History 2048 is a familiar logic game, with beautiful graphics. Travel trough the evolution of mankind, meet with famous kings, warlords and adventurer.

summary: Funko quiere apostar por personajes de Nintendo
title: Funko quiere apostar por personajes de Nintendo
excerpt: "Construir esa relación es importantísimo para nosotros", indicó el responsable de la empresa productora de los famosos Funko Pop! haciendo referencia a las nuevas aspiraciones sobre crear una linea para la franquicia de Nintendo.
description: ‘Construir esa relación es importantísimo para nosotros’, indicó el responsable de la empresa productora de los famosos Funko Pop! haciendo referencia a las nuevas aspiraciones sobre crear una linea para la franquicia de Nintendo.

reblog.comment: ‘Construir esa relación es importantísimo para nosotros’, indicó el responsable de la empresa productora de los famosos Funko Pop! haciendo referencia a las nuevas aspiraciones sobre crear una linea para la franquicia de Nintendo.

trail.content_raw: ‘Construir esa relación es importantísimo para nosotros’, indicó el responsable de la empresa productora de los famosos Funko Pop! haciendo referencia a las nuevas aspiraciones sobre crear una linea para la franquicia de Nintendo.
trail.content: ‘Construir esa relación es importantísimo para nosotros’, indicó el responsable de la empresa productora de los famosos Funko Pop! haciendo referencia a las nuevas aspiraciones sobre crear una linea para la franquicia de Nintendo.

summary: Here is a comparison of Daisy in her E3 Smash reveal vs. her in the final game. Small details have changed, such as her mouth...
caption: Here is a comparison of Daisy in her E3 Smash reveal vs. her in the final game. Small details have changed, such as her mouth becoming smaller. Her dress was also quite stiff in the original victory animation, but in the final game it flows naturally
